resources.string: This application is a Headwind MDM plugin. Please install APN setup helper through Headwind MDM!

Application settings are not correct

 Please ask your administrator setup the following application settings in the Headwind MDM control panel (application com.hmdm.apn):

 apn_desc: Human-readable name*
 apn_name: APN name*
 apn_mcc: MCC (country code)*
 apn_mnc: MNC (operator code)*
 apn_proxy_addr: Proxy address
 apn_proxy_port: Proxy port
 apn_user: Authentication username
 apn_password: Password

 * These fields are required and cannot be empty or missing.

 To remove the APN, add the following parameter to the application settings:

 apn_clear: 1
The APN has been set up!
Failed to set up APN: %s\n\nMake sure Headwind MDM is installed with device owner rights!
Custom APN settings have been cleared!
Sorry, but you can only set up a custom APN on Android 9 and above!
